channel.title: grown & sexy on courtside nyc
channel.description: Recent content in grown & sexy on courtside nyc

item.title: the nines
item.description: thoughts acme downstairs, opens 10:30 max table holds 6 people

item.title: raoul's
item.description: thoughts immaculate vibes fortune teller upstairs ($50 cash only) they hold 8 bar seats for walk-ins menu highlights steak frites - loaded with peppercorns, fantastic brussel sprouts

item.title: cath√©drale
item.description: thoughts space is beautfiul, so much fun for birthday dinner menu highlights octopus, tomatoes

item.title: ella funt
item.description: thoughts also cool bar scene menu highlights chicken

item.title: casino
item.description: thoughts there’s a cool bar in the basement menu highlights crispy baby artichokes nduja bread

item.title: singlish
item.description: thoughts bar tender was so nice and lovely to chat with :) space is tiny so def need resy menu highlights they’ve got some really nice whiskey

item.title: jac's on bond
item.description: thoughts make a res if you can, weeknights better than weekends imo everyone in there is cool and attractive and they know it

item.title: madeline's martini
item.description: thoughts great date spot menu highlights french martini

item.title: hilot
item.description: thoughts great date spot bar tender asked for our flavor profile so he could make us something off menu. i told him i liked tequila and ginger, got a riff on a mule that was one of the best cocktails i’ve ever had!

item.title: omar's kitchen & rum bar
item.description: thoughts literally everything is good

item.title: holiday bar
item.description: thoughts interesting concept, menu pulls all the best dishes the owners have had while on “holiday” - i.e. tuna tostada is clearly from contramar, cdmx (but not as good, duh)

item.title: cote
item.description: thoughts also has a cool bar scene

item.title: el quijote
item.description: thoughts they have a basement wine cellar you can rent out for a special event or birthday dinner! such a cool space. old and historic, but also trendy and cool. bar scene is lit. also can easily walk through the double doors at the back of the restaurant and head into the lobby bar at hotel chelsea for a post-dinner drink. menu highlights

item.title: 11 tigers
item.description: thoughts chaotic but wasn’t mad about it, fit the vibe

item.title: the ten bells
item.description: thoughts sneaky huge space in the back for private events or large partiest

item.title: mel's
item.description: thoughts great spot to come with a big group or a birthday dinner. menu highlights “the oil” side sauce the ice cream sundaes are gas

item.title: le dive
item.description: thoughts the best place to sit outside on a nice day. tables spill into dimes square - outdoor seating + cobblestones feels very european. basement bar where you can dance late nite !

item.title: mono + mono
item.description: thoughts also a going out spot - come for a late dinner and stay! dj spins late night. beautiful on the inside. plants everywhere, behing the bar is filled with fermenting jars of soju, walls are covered in records. menu highlights fried chicken is gas

item.title: nat's on bank
item.description: thoughts sister restaurant “nat’s on bleecker” is also good and has trivia on sundays

item.title: lil frankie's
item.description: thoughts crowd skews younger outdoor/curbside seating
